Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its
body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at
incredible depths. Because of this, this Pokémon’s body is
unharmed by ordinary attacks.

name: Relicanth
description:
Relicanth is a Pokémon species that existed for a hundred
million years without ever changing its form. This ancient
Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms with its
toothless mouth.

name: Luvdisc
description:
Luvdisc live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped
Pokémon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it
spotted in the ocean’s waves.

name: Bagon
description:
Bagon has a dream of one day soaring in the sky.
In doomed efforts to fly, this Pokémon hurls itself off cliffs.
As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard
as tempered steel.

name: Shelgon
description:
Inside Shelgon’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of
transformation to create an entirely new body. This Pokémon’s
shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.

name: Salamence
description:
Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held
dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire
triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokémon’s cells,
causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.

name: Beldum
description:
Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses
throughout Beldum’s body. This Pokémon communicates
with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.

name: Metang
description:
When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains
of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system.
By linking its brains magnetically, this Pokémon generates
strong psychokinetic power.

name: Metagross
description:
Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains
can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a
supercomputer. This Pokémon can float in the air by tucking in
its four legs.

name: Regirock
description:
Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If this
Pokémon’s body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek
out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.

name: Regice
description:
Regice’s body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen
body can’t be melted, even by fire. This Pokémon controls
frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Registeel
description:
Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal.
Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this
Pokémon eats.

name: Latias
description:
Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses
any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body
and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

name: Latios
description:
Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it
has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent
and understands human speech.

name: Kyogre
description:
Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s
full power, it will take back its true form. It can
summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.

name: Groudon
description:
Groudon is said to be the personification of the land
itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre,
as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Rayquaza
description:
Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions
of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest
the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

name: Jirachi
description:
A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is
written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this
Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

name: Turtwig
description:
Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the
sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.

name: Grotle
description:
It lives along water in forests. In the daytime,
it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra
description:
Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground,
a gigantic Torterra dwelled.

name: Chimchar
description:
Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly.
Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.

name: Monferno
description:
It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its
tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

name: Infernape
description:
Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature.
It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

name: Piplup
description:
It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to
bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.

name: Prinplup
description:
It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every
one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon
description:
It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its
wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

name: Starly
description:
They flock in great numbers. Though small, they
flap their wings with great power.

name: Staravia
description:
They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles
break out between various flocks.

name: Staraptor
description:
The muscles in its wings and legs are strong.
It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.

name: Bidoof
description:
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is
more agile and active than it appears.

name: Bibarel
description:
It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and
roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Kricketot
description:
It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding
antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.

name: Kricketune
description:
It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest
when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

name: Shinx
description:
The extension and contraction of its muscles
generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: Luxio
description:
Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage
to cause fainting. They live in small groups.

name: Luxray
description:
Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in
handy when it’s scouting for danger.

name: Budew
description:
When it feels the sun’s warm touch, it opens its bud
to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.

name: Roserade
description:
Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips
on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.

name: Growlithe
description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

name: Rampardos
description:
Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a
result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.

name: Shieldon
description:
It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against
tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.

name: Bastiodon
description:
When they lined up side by side, no foe could
break through. They shielded their young in
that way.

name: Burmy
description:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers
itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Wormadam
description:
Its appearance changes depending on where it
evolved. The materials on hand become a part of
its body.

name: Mothim
description:
It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey
collected by Combee.

name: Combee
description:
The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers
honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

name: Vespiquen
description:
Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its
grubs on honey collected by Combee.

name: Pachirisu
description:
It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity.
It stores them with berries in tree holes.

name: Buizel
description:
It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw.
When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.

name: Floatzel
description:
It floats using its well-developed flotation sac.
It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

name: Cherubi
description:
Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is
drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.

name: Cherrim
description:
During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms,
its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.

name: Ambipom
description:
They work in large colonies and make rings by
linking their tails, apparently in friendship.

name: Drifloon
description:
These Pokémon are called the “Signpost for
Wandering Spirits.” Children holding them
sometimes vanish.

name: Drifblim
description:
It carries people and Pokémon when it flies.
But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.

name: Buneary
description:
Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully
extended to shatter even a large boulder.

name: Lopunny
description:
The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched
roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

name: Mismagius
description:
It chants incantations. While they usually torment
targets, some chants bring happiness.

name: Honchkrow
description:
If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather
quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”

name: Glameow
description:
It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate.
Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Purugly
description:
It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own
if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

name: Chingling
description:
Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound.
It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

name: Stunky
description:
It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench
spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: Skuntank
description:
It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail
to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

name: Bronzor
description:
Ancient people believed that the pattern on
Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
description:
In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a
bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

name: Bonsly
description:
It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its
eyes to adjust its body’s fluid levels.

name: Mime Jr.
description:
In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the
enemy’s movements. Then it wastes no time in
making itself scarce!

name: Happiny
description:
It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly
pouch and gives the rock to its friends.

name: Chatot
description:
It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them
into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t
attack it.

name: Spiritomb
description:
A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is
bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

name: Gible
description:
It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal
heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be
pounced on and bitten.

name: Gabite
description:
It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves
and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Garchomp
description:
When it folds up its body and extends its wings,
it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: Munchlax
description:
It hides food under its long body hair. However,
it forgets it has hidden the food.

name: Riolu
description:
It uses the shapes of auras, which change
according to emotion, to communicate with others.

name: Lucario
description:
By catching the aura emanating from others, it can
read their thoughts and movements.

name: Hippopotas
description:
It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration,
it expels grainy sand from its body.

name: Hippowdon
description:
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of
fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand
while attacking.

name: Skorupi
description:
It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison.
It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

name: Drapion
description:
It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can
tear foes apart, it finishes them off with
powerful poison.

name: Croagunk
description:
Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes
off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

name: Toxicroak
description:
It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks,
the stored poison is churned for greater potency.

name: Carnivine
description:
It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then
chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: Finneon
description:
The line running down its side can store sunlight.
It shines vividly at night.

name: Lumineon
description:
It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by
flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

name: Mantyke
description:
The pattern on its back varies by region.
It often swims in a school of Remoraid.

name: Snover
description:
During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain’s
lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered
summit in the spring.

name: Abomasnow
description:
It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up
blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”

name: Weavile
description:
It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees
with its claws as a signal to others.

name: Magnezone
description:
Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is
too strong, making them attract each other so they
cannot move.

name: Lickilicky
description:
It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting
too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

name: Rhyperior
description:
From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude.
Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.

name: Tangrowth
description:
It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines.
Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

name: Electivire
description:
As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin
to crackle between its horns.

name: Magmortar
description:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit
from the ends of its arms. It lives in
volcanic craters.

name: Togekiss
description:
As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions,
bringing them gifts of kindness and
sweet blessings.

name: Yanmega
description:
It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads
instantly while flying by at high speed.

name: Leafeon
description:
When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of
sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis
to produce clean air.

name: Glaceon
description:
By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the
atmosphere around it to make a
diamond-dust flurry.

name: Gliscor
description:
It observes prey while hanging inverted from
branches. When the chance presents itself,
it swoops!

name: Mamoswine
description:
A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back
10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a
long, long, long time.

name: Porygon-Z
description:
Additional software was installed to make it a better
Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

name: Gallade
description:
Because it can sense what its foe is thinking,
its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

name: Probopass
description:
It exudes strong magnetism from all over.
It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

name: Dusknoir
description:
It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and
guide them home.

name: Froslass
description:
It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly
-60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body
is actually hollow.

name: Rotom
description:
Research continues on this Pokémon, which could
be the power source of a unique motor.

name: Uxie
description:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that
it can wipe out the memory of those who see
its eyes.

name: Mesprit
description:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught
humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: Azelf
description:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the
bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

name: Dialga
description:
A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time
began moving when Dialga was born.

name: Palkia
description:
It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension
parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

name: Heatran
description:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its
cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: Regigigas
description:
It is said to have made Pokémon that look like
itself from a special ice mountain, rocks,
and magma.

name: Cresselia
description:
Shiny particles are released from its wings like a
veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Phione
description:
When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac
on their heads and drift languidly on the sea
in packs.

name: Manaphy
description:
It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond
with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Darkrai
description:
It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by
causing them to experience deep,
nightmarish slumbers.

name: Shaymin
description:
It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly
transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

name: Victini
description:
This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers
with Victini always win, regardless of the type
of encounter.

name: Snivy
description:
Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements
swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: Servine
description:
It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift
movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks
with a vine whip.

name: Serperior
description:
It only gives its all against strong opponents who
are not fazed by the glare from Serperior’s
noble eyes.

name: Tepig
description:
It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting
fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it
eats them.

name: Pignite
description:
The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the
fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even
more power.

name: Emboar
description:
It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire
with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Oshawott
description:
It fights using the scalchop on its stomach.
In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately
by slashing.

name: Dewott
description:
Strict training is how it learns its flowing
double-scalchop technique.

name: Samurott
description:
In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and
sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

name: Patrat
description:
Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep
watch for days. They use their tails to communicate
with others.

name: Watchog
description:
Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and
body glow and stuns attacking opponents.

name: Lillipup
description:
The long hair around its face provides an amazing
radar that lets it sense subtle changes in
its surroundings.

name: Herdier
description:
This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also
takes care of other Pokémon.

name: Stoutland
description:
It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the
mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.

name: Purrloin
description:
Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their
guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with
sharp claws.

name: Liepard
description:
Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they
have developed. They run silently in the night.

name: Pansage
description:
It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking
Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

name: Simisage
description:
It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered
tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

name: Pansear
description:
Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them.
It likes to help people.

name: Simisear
description:
A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers
from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

name: Panpour
description:
The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full
of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.

name: Simipour
description:
The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so
powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.

name: Munna
description:
This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon
who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.

name: Musharna
description:
The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed
with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

name: Pidove
description:
This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new
order from its Trainer even though it already
has one.

name: Tranquill
description:
Many people believe that, deep in the forest where
Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there
is no war.

name: Unfezant
description:
Males swing their head plumage to threaten
opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass
those of the males.

name: Blitzle
description:
When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear.
It can catch lightning with its mane and store
the electricity.

name: Zebstrika
description:
When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it
shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

name: Roggenrola
description:
Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed
underground, its body is as hard as steel.

name: Boldore
description:
Because its energy was too great to be contained,
the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.

name: Gigalith
description:
The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its
energy core and fired as a ball of light.

name: Woobat
description:
Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits
ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about
its surroundings.

name: Swoobat
description:
It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic
waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.

name: Drilbur
description:
It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting
both claws together and rotating at high speed.

name: Excadrill
description:
It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has
evolved into steel strong enough to bore through
iron plates.

name: Audino
description:
Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how
someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.

name: Timburr
description:
These Pokémon appear at building sites and help
out with construction. They always carry
squared logs.

name: Gurdurr
description:
With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel
beams to take down buildings.

name: Conkeldurr
description:
It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to
make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

name: Tympole
description:
By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves
imperceptible to humans and warns others
of danger.

name: Palpitoad
description:
When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they
can make waves in water or earthquake-like
vibrations on land.

name: Seismitoad
description:
It increases the power of its punches by vibrating
the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to
rubble with one punch.

name: Throh
description:
When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild
Throh use vines to weave their own belts.

name: Sawk
description:
Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude
themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

name: Sewaddle
description:
This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up
leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded
from its mouth.

name: Swadloon
description:
Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage
because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves
nourish the plant life.

name: Leavanny
description:
Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing
for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted
from its mouth.

name: Venipede
description:
It discovers what is going on around it by using the
feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.

name: Whirlipede
description:
Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a
wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

name: Scolipede
description:
It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it
stops moving. Then it finishes it off with
deadly poison.

name: Cottonee
description:
When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from
its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract
the attacker.

name: Whimsicott
description:
They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull
pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls
of cotton in homes.

name: Petilil
description:
The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one
of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

name: Lilligant
description:
The fragrance of the garland on its head has a
relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take
good care of it.

name: Basculin
description:
Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and
always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.

name: Sandile
description:
It moves along below the sand’s surface, except
for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its
eyes from the sun.

name: Krokorok
description:
They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective
membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

name: Krookodile
description:
Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on
anything that moves in front of their eyes.

name: Darumaka
description:
Darumaka’s droppings are hot, so people used to
put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.

name: Darmanitan
description:
When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens
into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and
sharpens its mind.

name: Maractus
description:
It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away
the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

name: Dwebble
description:
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock
breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it
locates a replacement.

name: Crustle
description:
It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it
to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when
crossing arid land.

name: Scraggy
description:
Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce
damage by defensively pulling its skin up to
its neck.

name: Scrafty
description:
It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while
it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected
it is.

name: Sigilyph
description:
The guardians of an ancient city, they use their
psychic power to attack enemies that invade
their territory.

name: Yamask
description:
These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people
interred in graves. Each retains memories of its
former life.

name: Cofagrigus
description:
It has been said that they swallow those who get
too close and turn them into mummies. They like to
eat gold nuggets.

name: Tirtouga
description:
About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam
in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to
attack prey.

name: Carracosta
description:
They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap
from one of them is enough to open a hole in the
bottom of a tanker.

name: Archen
description:
Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to
be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.

name: Archeops
description:
They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch
prey. From the ground, they use a running start to
take flight.

name: Trubbish
description:
The combination of garbage bags and industrial
waste caused the chemical reaction that created
this Pokémon.

name: Garbodor
description:
It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes
them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from
its mouth.

name: Zorua
description:
It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and
then uses that opportunity to flee.

name: Zoroark
description:
Each has the ability to fool a large group of people
simultaneously. They protect their lair with
illusory scenery.

name: Minccino
description:
Minccino greet each other by grooming one another
thoroughly with their tails.

name: Cinccino
description:
Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur
repels dust and prevents static electricity from
building up.

name: Gothita
description:
Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic
power. They are always staring at something.

name: Gothorita
description:
Starlight is the source of their power. At night,
they mark star positions by using psychic power
to float stones.

name: Gothitelle
description:
Starry skies thousands of light-years away are
visible in the space distorted by their intense
psychic power.

name: Solosis
description:
Because their bodies are enveloped in a special
liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter
how severe.

name: Duosion
description:
Since they have two divided brains, at times they
suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

name: Reuniclus
description:
They use psychic power to control their arms,
which are made of a special liquid. They can crush
boulders psychically.

name: Ducklett
description:
When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water,
escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Swanna
description:
Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap
their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Vanillite
description:
The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees
Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make
snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillish
description:
They cool down the surrounding air and create ice
particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

name: Vanilluxe
description:
If both heads get angry simultaneously, this
Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything
in snow.

name: Deerling
description:
Their coloring changes according to the seasons
and can be slightly affected by the temperature and
humidity as well.

name: Sawsbuck
description:
They migrate according to the seasons. People can
tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.

name: Emolga
description:
They live on treetops and glide using the inside of
a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.

name: Karrablast
description:
These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they
receive electrical stimulation while they are in the
same place as Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
description:
Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet,
they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

name: Foongus
description:
It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then
releases poison spores. Why it resembles a
Poké Ball is unknown.

name: Amoonguss
description:
They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey,
but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.

name: Frillish
description:
They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them
down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.

name: Jellicent
description:
Its body is mostly seawater. It’s said there’s a
castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

name: Alomomola
description:
Floating in the open sea is how they live.
When they find a wounded Pokémon,
they embrace it and bring it to shore.

name: Joltik
description:
Since it can’t generate its own electricity, it sticks
onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs
static electricity.

name: Galvantula
description:
They employ an electrically charged web to trap
their prey. While it is immobilized by shock,
they leisurely consume it.

name: Ferroseed
description:
When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage
of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by
rolling away.

name: Ferrothorn
description:
By swinging around its three spiky feelers and
shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.

name: Klink
description:
Interlocking two bodies and spinning around
generates the energy they need to live.

name: Klang
description:
By changing the direction in which it rotates,
it communicates its feelings to others. When angry,
it rotates faster.

name: Klinklang
description:
The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed
for a rapid energy charge.

name: Tynamo
description:
While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain
of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

name: Eelektrik
description:
It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with
electricity from the round spots on its sides.
Then it chomps.

name: Eelektross
description:
With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey.
Then they use their fangs to shock the prey
with electricity.

name: Elgyem
description:
It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its
opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.

name: Beheeyem
description:
Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three
fingers, but those patterns haven’t been decoded.

name: Litwick
description:
While shining a light and pretending to be a guide,
it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

name: Lampent
description:
The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs
around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.

name: Chandelure
description:
Being consumed in Chandelure’s flame burns up
the spirit, leaving the body behind.

name: Axew
description:
They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat.
Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong
and sharp.

name: Fraxure
description:
Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles
between Fraxure can be intensely violent.

name: Haxorus
description:
They are kind but can be relentless when defending
territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can
cut steel.

name: Cubchoo
description:
Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up
because the mucus provides the raw material for
its moves.

name: Beartic
description:
They love the cold seas of the north. They create
pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their
own breath.

name: Cryogonal
description:
They are born in snow clouds. They use chains
made of ice crystals to capture prey.

name: Shelmet
description:
When it and Karrablast are together, and both
receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.

name: Accelgor
description:
Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very
light and can fight with ninja-like movements.

name: Stunfisk
description:
Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped
on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when
transmitting electricity.

name: Mienfoo
description:
It takes pride in the speed at which it can use
moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for
in quantity.

name: Mienshao
description:
It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm
attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot
even be seen.

name: Druddigon
description:
It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws
to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than
a rock.

name: Golett
description:
The energy that burns inside it enables it to move,
but no one has yet been able to identify
this energy.

name: Golurk
description:
It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect
people and Pokémon by the ancient people who
made them.

name: Pawniard
description:
Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body.
If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on
stones by the river.

requirements: Defeat 15 Dark- or Steel-type Raid Bosses

name: Bisharp
description:
This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of
Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then
moves in to finish the prey off.

requirements: Defeat 15 Dark- or Steel-type Raid Bosses

name: Bouffalant
description:
They charge wildly and headbutt everything.
Their headbutts have enough destructive force to
derail a train.

name: Rufflet
description:
They crush berries with their talons. They bravely
stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong
it is.

name: Braviary
description:
For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the
sky will not stop battling, even if injured.

name: Vullaby
description:
Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time
approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones
it was wearing.

name: Mandibuzz
description:
They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot
prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest
with ease.

name: Heatmor
description:
Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues,
they burn through Durant’s steel bodies and
consume their insides.

name: Durant
description:
Individuals each play different roles in driving
Heatmor, their natural predator, away from
their colony.

name: Deino
description:
They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn
about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered
in wounds.

name: Zweilous
description:
The two heads do not get along. Whichever head
eats more than the other gets to be the leader.

name: Hydreigon
description:
The heads on their arms do not have brains.
They use all three heads to consume and
destroy everything.

name: Larvesta
description:
Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire
from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire
when it evolves.

name: Volcarona
description:
A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their
battles, since they use their six wings to scatter
their ember scales.

name: Cobalion
description:
It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is
sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.

name: Terrakion
description:
Its charge is strong enough to break through a
giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is
spoken of in legends.

name: Virizion
description:
Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using
whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly
cuts opponents.

name: Tornadus
description:
The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of
energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: Thundurus
description:
The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of
lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off
lightning bolts.

name: Reshiram
description:
This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with
fire. It helps those who want to build a world
of truth.

name: Zekrom
description:
This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with
lightning. It assists those who want to build an
ideal world.

name: Landorus
description:
Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful
crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of
the Fields.”

name: Kyurem
description:
This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill
in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: Keldeo
description:
It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of
oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.

name: Meloetta
description:
The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to
make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.

name: Chespin
description:
The quills on its head are usually soft.
When it flexes them, the points become
so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

name: Quilladin
description:
It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’
attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

name: Chesnaught
description:
Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank.
It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

name: Fennekin
description:
Eating a twig fills it with energy,
and its roomy ears give vent to air
hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Braixen
description:
It has a twig stuck in its tail. With
friction from its tail fur, it sets the
twig on fire and launches into battle.

name: Delphox
description:
It gazes into the flame at the tip of
its branch to achieve a focused state,
which allows it to see into the future.

name: Froakie
description:
It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back.
The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise
take when attacked.

name: Frogadier
description:
It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise
control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: Greninja
description:
It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.
When it spins them and throws them at high speed,
these stars can split metal in two.

name: Bunnelby
description:
They use their large ears to dig burrows.
They will dig the whole night through.

name: Diggersby
description:
With their powerful ears, they can heft
boulders of a ton or more with ease.
They can be a big help at construction sites.

name: Fletchling
description:
These friendly Pokémon send signals
to one another with beautiful chirps
and tail-feather movements.

name: Fletchinder
description:
From its beak, it expels embers that set
the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on
the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

name: Talonflame
description:
In the fever of an exciting battle, it
showers embers from the gaps between
its feathers and takes to the air.

name: Scatterbug
description:
When under attack from bird Pokémon,
it spews a poisonous black powder
that causes paralysis on contact.

name: Spewpa
description:
It lives hidden within thicket shadows.
When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur
covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

name: Vivillon
description:
Vivillon with many different patterns are
found all over the world. These patterns
are affected by the climate of their habitat.

name: Litleo
description:
The stronger the opponent it faces,
the more heat surges from its mane
and the more power flows through its body.

name: Pyroar
description:
The male with the largest mane of fire
is the leader of the pride.

name: Flabébé
description:
It draws out and controls the hidden power
of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds
is most likely part of its body.

name: Floette
description:
It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for
flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws
out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

name: Florges
description:
It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory,
and it obtains power from basking in the energy
emitted by flowering plants.

name: Skiddo
description:
Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in
harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

name: Gogoat
description:
It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by
subtle shifts in the grip on its horns.
This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

name: Pancham
description:
It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies,
but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating.
Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.

name: Pangoro
description:
Although it possesses a violent temperament,
it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in
its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

name: Furfrou
description:
Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes
it more elegant but also increases the
swiftness of its movements.

name: Espurr
description:
The organ that emits its intense psychic power is
sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

name: Meowstic
description:
When in danger, it raises its ears and
releases enough psychic power to
grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

name: Honedge
description:
Apparently this Pokémon is born when a
departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself
to people and drinks their life force.

name: Doublade
description:
When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords,
which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks
and slash their enemies to ribbons.

name: Spritzee
description:
It emits a scent that enraptures those
who smell it. This fragrance changes
depending on what it has eaten.

name: Aromatisse
description:
It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant,
and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order
to gain an edge in battle.

name: Swirlix
description:
To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes
white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

name: Slurpuff
description:
It can distinguish the faintest of scents.
It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use
by helping pastry chefs in their work.

name: Inkay
description:
Opponents who stare at the flashing of the
light-emitting spots on its body become
dazed and lose their will to fight.

name: Malamar
description:
It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers
of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do
whatever it wants.

name: Binacle
description:
Two Binacle live together on one rock.
When they fight, one of them will move
to a different rock.

name: Barbaracle
description:
When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven.
They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

name: Skrelp
description:
Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray
liquid poison on prey that approaches
unawares and then finish it off.

name: Dragalge
description:
Their poison is strong enough to eat through
the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately
at anything that enters their territory.

name: Clauncher
description:
They knock down flying prey by firing
compressed water from their massive
claws like shooting a pistol.

name: Clawitzer
description:
Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of
water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

name: Helioptile
description:
They make their home in deserts. They can
generate their energy from basking in the sun,
so eating food is not a requirement.

name: Heliolisk
description:
They flare their frills and generate energy.
A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient
electricity to power a skyscraper.

name: Tyrunt
description:
This Pokémon was restored from a fossil.
If something happens that it doesn’t like,
it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

name: Tyrantrum
description:
Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred
thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was
invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

name: Amaura
description:
This ancient Pokémon was restored
from part of its body that had been
frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

name: Aurorus
description:
The diamond-shaped crystals on its body
expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit,
surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

name: Sylveon
description:
It sends a soothing aura from its
ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.

name: Hawlucha
description:
Although its body is small, its proficient
fighting skills enable it to keep up with
big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

name: Dedenne
description:
Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and
receiving electrical waves, it can communicate
with others over vast distances.

name: Carbink
description:
Born from the temperatures and pressures
deep underground, it fires beams from the
stone in its head.

name: Goomy
description:
The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon,
it lives in damp, shady places, so its
body doesn’t dry out.

name: Sliggoo
description:
It drives away opponents by excreting a
sticky liquid that can dissolve anything.
Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.

name: Goodra
description:
This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon
will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving
that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

name: Klefki
description:
These key collectors threaten any attackers
by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

name: Phantump
description:
These Pokémon are created when
spirits possess rotten tree stumps.
They prefer to live in abandoned forests.

name: Trevenant
description:
It can control trees at will. It will trap people
who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

name: Pumpkaboo
description:
The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit
trapped in this world. As the sun sets,
it becomes restless and active.

name: Gourgeist
description:
Singing in eerie voices, they wander
town streets on the night of the new moon.
Anyone who hears their song is cursed.

name: Bergmite
description:
It blocks opponents’ attacks with the
ice that shields its body. It uses cold air
to repair any cracks with new ice.

name: Avalugg
description:
Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel.
Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that
stands in its way.

name: Noibat
description:
They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears
can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.

name: Noivern
description:
They fly around on moonless nights
and attack careless prey. Nothing can
beat them in a battle in the dark.

name: Xerneas
description:
Legends say it can share eternal life.
It slept for a thousand years in the form
of a tree before its revival.

name: Yveltal
description:
When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and
tail feathers spread wide and glow red,
it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

name: Zygarde
description:
When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into
disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

name: Diancie
description:
A sudden transformation of Carbink,
its pink, glimmering body is said to be
the loveliest sight in the whole world.

name: Volcanion
description:
It lets out billows of steam and disappears into
the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains
where humans do not tread.

name: Decidueye
description: Decidueye can nock and fire an arrow at an enemy in a tenth of a second, so its battles are decided in the blink of an eye.
